long_description: The ultralight Zip snowboard tool from Burton is so compact you won't notice it in your pocket. Make all kinds of on-the-hill adjustments with the Zip. Includes #2 and #3 Phillips screwdriver bits, flathead, 4mm Allen key and a small 10mm wrench. Bits and wrench fit inside the Zip tool. Ergonomic case even features a squeegee for wiping goggles, and the 10mm wrench doubles as a bottle opener.
short_description: The ultralight Zip snowboard tool from Burton is so compact you won't notice it in your pocket. Make all kinds of on-the-hill adjustments with the Zip.
